Tasks.Task Description: Use Azure Monitor to continuously track the performance metrics of Azure Cosmos DB, including throughput, latency, and request units (RUs). Investigate and address any anomalies.
Ensure regular backups of Azure Cosmos DB data are configured and verify the integrity of backups. Test restore procedures periodically to confirm data recovery capabilities.
Periodically review and optimize indexing policies to ensure efficient query performance and cost management.
Conduct regular audits of security settings, including firewall rules, access keys, and role-based access control (RBAC) configurations, to ensure compliance with security policies.
Monitor usage patterns and adjust the provisioned throughput (RUs) to meet application demands while optimizing costs.
Perform failover tests to validate the high availability and disaster recovery capabilities of Azure Cosmos DB across multiple regions.
Analyze query performance metrics and optimize queries to reduce latency and resource consumption.
Ensure that applications using Azure Cosmos DB are updated to the latest SDKs and APIs to leverage new features and security updates.
Evaluate the partitioning strategy to ensure optimal distribution of data and efficient scaling.
Perform regular compliance checks to ensure Azure Cosmos DB adheres to organizational and regulatory requirements.
Keep documentation for Azure Cosmos DB configurations, operational procedures, and troubleshooting guides up-to-date.
Conduct incident response drills to prepare for potential security incidents or database outages. Ensure familiarity with procedures and protocols.
Review Azure Cosmos DB usage and costs to identify opportunities for optimization and cost savings.
Ensure the operations team participates in regular training to stay updated with new Azure Cosmos DB features, best practices, and security measures.
